feed.title: Category: Pac-Man CE DX | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Pac-Man CE DX (X360, 2010) (7)
entry.content:
I played for about an hour today and got a lot more S-ranks and stuff.

New overall ranking: 2,160/248,420 --- 0.86%

entry.title: Game: Pac-Man CE DX (X360, 2010) (5)
entry.content: Today and a few weeks ago, I improved my score a bit. I am now 3,526/248,092, in the top 1.42%. I still have a few modes that are not all As. I plan on getting all As and then eventually Ss.

entry.title: Game: Pac-Man CE DX (X360, 2010) (4)
entry.content: Today I finished getting As or above on every event in Pac-Man CE DX. My ranking across the whole game is 5,100/245,281 or in the top 2.07%. It's a really fun game. I think I like the normal mode the most. The time trial is fun, but I think it's too easy to cheese out and ignore the ghosts and just take shortcuts, so it eliminates a bit of the unique fun of CE-DX. Such an awesome game.

entry.title: Game: Pac-Man CE DX (X360, 2010) (3)
entry.content: I got the Championship I Ghost Combo... but I got LAST place: 9,483/9,483!
